about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
Playful toads begin your adventure into this critter watch immersion. Find delight in this lovely setting as you watch the toads joyfully jump around together. Next see if you can spot the bunny as it forages around. Finish your adventure reflecting on your own tenacious traits as you end your experience with the old wise turtle.

Purpose
Wildlife
Adventure
Totem meditations

Length
11:01

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
